{{Infobox Radio station |image =| |name = ABC North West Queensland| |callsign = 4ABC| |coordinates = {{Coord|20|43|23.92|S|139|29|38.40|E|type:landmark_scale:2000_region:AU}} |airdate = 1986| |frequency =106.5 [[Megahertz|mHz]] [[frequency modulation|FM]] Mount Isa
567 [[kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]] Julia Creek
1485 [[kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]] Hughenden | |area = [[Regions of Queensland#North West|North West Queensland]]| |owner = [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation]] | |format = [[Talk radio|Talk]] | |website = [http://www.abc.net.au/northwest/ http://www.abc.net.au/northwest/] | }} '''ABC North West Queensland''' is an [[ABC Local Radio]] station based in [[Mount Isa, Queensland|Mount Isa]]. The station broadcasts to the [[Regions of Queensland#North West|North West]] region of [[Queensland]], which includes the towns of [[Cloncurry, Queensland|Cloncurry]], [[Julia Creek, Queensland|Julia Creek]], [[Hughenden, Queensland|Hughenden]] and [[Normanton, Queensland|Normanton]]. The station began broadcasting as '''4MI''' in 1986 on 1080 AM. Now there are a number of low power FM transmitters as well as these main transmitters: *'''4ISA''' 106.5 FM *'''4JK''' 567 AM *'''4HU''' 1485 AM ==Local Programs== ===Weekdays=== *Breakfast with Andrew Saunders â 5:30 AM to 8:00 AM *Rural News with Vicki Wilson â 6:15 AM to 6:30 AM *Mornings with Stacey Katter â 8:30 AM to 11:00 AM ===Saturday=== *Saturday Breakfast with Bruce Underwood â 6:00 AM to 10:00 AM When local programs are not broadcast the station is a relay of [[ABC Capricornia]] or [[612 ABC Brisbane]]. ==References== {{cite web |title=ABC North Westâs history |url= http://www.abc.net.au/local/stories/2008/03/07/2183812.htm|date=2008-03-07 |accessdate=2008-05-06 |publisher=[[ABC Online]] }} ==See also== * [[List of Australian radio stations]] {{ABC Local Radio}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Abc North West Queensland}} [[Category:Radio stations in Queensland]] [[Category:North West Queensland]]
